entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers. Showers beginning overnight. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Sunday 23 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Showers. High 12.
entry.summary: A few showers ending in the afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of showers. Wind becoming south 20 km/h near noon. High 12. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Sunday 23 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers early in the evening. Clearing overnight. Fog patches developing after midnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Sunday 23 April 2023
